channel.title: Server Start Problem
channel.description:
So, when I try to run my server, it gives me this in the CMD...
java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested address: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(PlainSocketImpl.java:383) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(ServerSocket.java:328) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:194) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:150) at net.com.codeusa.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:40) at net.com.codeusa.Server.main(Server.java:61) Press any key to continue . . .
Can anybody possibly help me? I think the source is z508, it used to be called Yous-World or something like that. Thanks.
Still nobody answered? :(

item.title: Server Start Problem
item.dc:creator: @Eddsterz Eddsterz
item.description:
@Eddsterz wrote:

So, when I try to run my server, it gives me this in the CMDâ€¦

java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested address: JVM_Bind
at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method)
at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(PlainSocketImpl.java:383)
at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(ServerSocket.java:328)
at java.net.ServerSocket.(ServerSocket.java:194)
at java.net.ServerSocket.(ServerSocket.java:150)
at net.com.codeusa.net.SocketListener.(SocketListener.java:40)
at net.com.codeusa.Server.main(Server.java:61)
Press any key to continue . . .

Can anybody possibly help me? I think the source is z508, it used to be called Yous-World or something like that. Thanks.

Still nobody answered?
